languages.text: Сокровища и влияние быстро развратили высших иерархов Фолстоуна, обратив их в скопище коррумпированных себялюбцев, помазанных миром алчности. Верша под святыми ризами свои грязные делишки, они стяжали все больше силы. Неудивительно, что спустя несколько лет иерархи Фолстоуна признал истиной факт кровного родства между династией фон Валанциус, своими покровителями, и святым Когнацием.

Treasures and influence quickly corrupted the supreme hierarchs of Foulstone, turning them into a coterie of venal egotists anointed by greed. As they did dirty deeds under the cover of holy vestments, their power steadily grew. It is hardly surprising that a few years later the hierarchs of Foulstone recognised the blood relationship between their patrons the von Valancius dynasty and Saint Cognatius himself.
languages.original_text: Сокровища и влияние быстро развратили высших иерархов Фолстоуна, обратив их в скопище коррумпированных себялюбцев, помазанных миром алчности. Верша под святыми ризами свои грязные делишки, они стяжали все больше силы. Неудивительно, что спустя несколько лет иерархи Фолстоуна признал истиной факт кровного родства между династией фон Валанциус, своими покровителями, и святым Когнацием.

traits.locale_text: Treasures and influence quickly corrupted the supreme hierarchs of Foulstone, turning them into a coterie of corrupt self-lovers anointed by greed. As they did dirty deeds under the cover of holy vestments, they power steadily grew. It is hardly surprising that a few years later the hierarchs of Foulstone recognized the blood relationship between the their patrons, the von Valancius dynasty, and Saint Cognatius himself.

Treasures and influence quickly corrupted the supreme hierarchs of Foulstone, turning them into a coterie of corrupt self-lovers anointed by greed. As they did dirty deeds under the cover of holy vestments, they power steadily grew. It is hardly surprising that a few years later the hierarchs of Foulstone recognized the blood relationship between the their patrons, the von Valancius dynasty, and Saint Cognatius himself.

Treasures and influence quickly corrupted the supreme hierarchs of Foulstone, turning them into a coterie of venal egotists anointed by greed. As they did dirty deeds under the cover of holy vestments, their power steadily grew. It is hardly surprising that a few years later the hierarchs of Foulstone recognised the blood relationship between their patrons the von Valancius dynasty and Saint Cognatius himself.

Treasures and influence quickly corrupted the supreme hierarchs of Foulstone, turning them into a coterie of venal egotists anointed by greed. As they did dirty deeds under the cover of holy vestments, their power steadily grew. It is hardly surprising that a few years later the hierarchs of Foulstone recognised the blood relationship between their patrons the von Valancius dynasty and Saint Cognatius himself.

Treasures and influence quickly corrupted the supreme hierarchs of Foulstone, turning them into a coterie of venal egotists anointed by greed. As they did dirty deeds under the cover of holy vestments, their power steadily grew. It is hardly surprising that a few years later the hierarchs of Foulstone recognised the blood relationship between their patrons the von Valancius dynasty and Saint Cognatius himself.

languages.text: 由于突如其来的财富与影响力，荒寂岩地最高级别的领导人很快遭到了腐化，变成了一群贪得无厌的利己主义者。他们在神圣教条的掩护之下，做着各种肮脏的勾当，权力也在不断稳步增长。几年之后，他们突然公然宣称，说荒寂岩地的赞助人冯·瓦兰修斯王朝，实际上与圣科尼亚蒂乌斯本人存在血缘关系，这样的结果真是令人毫不意外。
languages.original_text: Treasures and influence quickly corrupted the supreme hierarchs of Foulstone, turning them into a coterie of venal egotists anointed by greed. As they did dirty deeds under the cover of holy vestments, their power steadily grew. It is hardly surprising that a few years later the hierarchs of Foulstone recognised the blood relationship between their patrons the von Valancius dynasty and Saint Cognatius himself.

traits.locale_text: 由于突如其来的财富与影响力，荒寂岩地最高级别的领导人很快遭到了腐化，变成了一群贪得无厌的利己主义者。他们在神圣教条的掩护之下，做着各种肮脏的勾当，权力也在不断稳步增长。几年之后，他们突然公然宣称，说荒寂岩地的赞助人冯·瓦兰修斯王朝，实际上与圣科尼亚蒂乌斯本人存在血缘关系，这样的结果真是令人毫不意外。

languages.text: 財宝と影響力はすぐにファウルストーンの高位の高僧達を堕落させ、彼らを欲まみれの傲慢な一団と変えた。教会の式服の下で不正を働きながら、彼らは着実に権力を強めていった。数年後にファウルストーンの権力者達が自分たちの支援者であるフォン・ヴァランシウス王朝と聖コグナティウスとの間の血縁関係を認識したのはさして驚くことではない。
languages.original_text: Treasures and influence quickly corrupted the supreme hierarchs of Foulstone, turning them into a coterie of venal egotists anointed by greed. As they did dirty deeds under the cover of holy vestments, their power steadily grew. It is hardly surprising that a few years later the hierarchs of Foulstone recognised the blood relationship between their patrons the von Valancius dynasty and Saint Cognatius himself.

traits.locale_text: 財宝と影響力はすぐにファウルストーンの高位の高僧達を堕落させ、彼らを欲まみれの傲慢な一団と変えた。教会の式服の下で不正を働きながら、彼らは着実に権力を強めていった。数年後にファウルストーンの権力者達が自分たちの支援者であるフォン・ヴァランシウス王朝と聖コグナティウスとの間の血縁関係を認識したのはさして驚くことではない。

languages.text: Les hiérarques suprêmes de Rochepeste se laissèrent vite corrompre par les richesses et l'influence, devenant une coterie d'égoïstes vénaux et motivés par la cupidité. En accomplissant de sales besognes parés de vêtements saints, ils renforcèrent peu à peu leur pouvoir. Il n'est donc pas surprenant que les hiérarques de Rochepeste aient reconnu quelques années plus tard la parenté entre leurs protecteurs de la dynastie von Valancius et Saint Cognatius en personne.
languages.original_text: Treasures and influence quickly corrupted the supreme hierarchs of Foulstone, turning them into a coterie of venal egotists anointed by greed. As they did dirty deeds under the cover of holy vestments, their power steadily grew. It is hardly surprising that a few years later the hierarchs of Foulstone recognised the blood relationship between their patrons the von Valancius dynasty and Saint Cognatius himself.

traits.locale_text: Les hiérarques suprêmes de Rochepeste se laissèrent vite corrompre par les richesses et l'influence, devenant une coterie d'égoïstes vénaux et motivés par la cupidité. En accomplissant de sales besognes parés de vêtements saints, ils renforcèrent peu à peu leur pouvoir. Il n'est donc pas surprenant que les hiérarques de Rochepeste aient reconnu quelques années plus tard la parenté entre leurs protecteurs de la dynastie von Valancius et Saint Cognatius en personne.

languages.text: Los tesoros y la influencia corrompieron rápidamente a los jerarcas supremos de Rocainmunda, convirtiéndolos en una caterva de egoístas fáciles de sobornar, consumidos por la avaricia. Mientras realizaban actos impíos bajo el manto de sus ropajes sagrados, su poder se incrementó. No fue ninguna sorpresa que, unos años después, los jerarcas de Rocainmunda reconocieran oficialmente la relación de sangre entre la dinastía von Valancius que los financiaba y el mismísimo san Cognatius.
languages.original_text: Treasures and influence quickly corrupted the supreme hierarchs of Foulstone, turning them into a coterie of venal egotists anointed by greed. As they did dirty deeds under the cover of holy vestments, their power steadily grew. It is hardly surprising that a few years later the hierarchs of Foulstone recognised the blood relationship between their patrons the von Valancius dynasty and Saint Cognatius himself.

traits.locale_text: Los tesoros y la influencia corrompieron rápidamente a los jerarcas supremos de Rocainmunda, convirtiéndolos en una caterva de egoístas fáciles de sobornar, consumidos por la avaricia. Mientras realizaban actos impíos bajo el manto de sus ropajes sagrados, su poder se incrementó. No fue ninguna sorpresa que, unos años después, los jerarcas de Rocainmunda reconocieran oficialmente la relación de sangre entre la dinastía von Valancius que los financiaba y el mismísimo san Cognatius.

languages.text: Schätze und Einfluss korrumpierten rasch die oberste Hierarchie von Foulstone und machte daraus eine Koterie käuflicher Egoisten, die nur von Gier getrieben wurden. Sie machten unter heiligem Deckmantel schmutzige Geschäfte und steigerten stetig ihre Macht. Es überrascht kaum, dass die Hierarchen von Foulstone wenige Jahre später die Blutsverwandtschaft zwischen ihrem Patron, der Dynastie von Valancius, und dem Hl. Cognatius selbst anerkannten.
languages.original_text: Treasures and influence quickly corrupted the supreme hierarchs of Foulstone, turning them into a coterie of venal egotists anointed by greed. As they did dirty deeds under the cover of holy vestments, their power steadily grew. It is hardly surprising that a few years later the hierarchs of Foulstone recognised the blood relationship between their patrons the von Valancius dynasty and Saint Cognatius himself.

traits.locale_text: Schätze und Einfluss korrumpierten rasch die oberste Hierarchie von Foulstone und machte daraus eine Koterie käuflicher Egoisten, die nur von Gier getrieben wurden. Sie machten unter heiligem Deckmantel schmutzige Geschäfte und steigerten stetig ihre Macht. Es überrascht kaum, dass die Hierarchen von Foulstone wenige Jahre später die Blutsverwandtschaft zwischen ihrem Patron, der Dynastie von Valancius, und dem Hl. Cognatius selbst anerkannten.

languages.text: Menfurtaş'ın en üst düzey din adamları, hazineleri ve nüfuzları yüzünden hızla yozlaştı; açgözlülükle hareket eden, rüşvet arsızı, egoist bir gruba dönüştüler. Kutsal cübbelerinin arkasına gizlenerek kirli eylemlerde bulundular, güçleri de istikrarlı bir şekilde arttı. Birkaç yıl sonra Menfurtaş'taki din adamlarının, hamileri olan von Valancius hanedanlığı ile Aziz Cognatius arasındaki kan bağını tanımış olmalarına şaşmamak gerek.
languages.original_text: Treasures and influence quickly corrupted the supreme hierarchs of Foulstone, turning them into a coterie of venal egotists anointed by greed. As they did dirty deeds under the cover of holy vestments, their power steadily grew. It is hardly surprising that a few years later the hierarchs of Foulstone recognised the blood relationship between their patrons the von Valancius dynasty and Saint Cognatius himself.

traits.locale_text: Menfurtaş'ın en üst düzey din görevlileri, hazineleri ve nüfuzları nedeniyle hızla yozlaştılar; açgözlülükleriyle hareket eden, rüşvet meraklısı, egoist bir gruba dönüştüler. Kutsal cübbelerinin arkasına gizlenerek kirli eylemlerde bulundular ve güçleri istikrarlı bir şekilde arttı. Menfurtaş'taki din görevlilerinin birkaç yıl sonra, von Valancius hanedanlığındaki hamileri ve Aziz Cognatius arasındaki kan bağını tanımış olmaları hiç de şaşırtıcı değil.
